mapper.select: SELECT CH.HTML_FL_PTH AS html, H.HTML_FL_NM AS htmlName, CH.SRE_VCB_CDVA_ID AS lang, C.SRE_VCB_NM AS langName FROM OEHR.THURXE_CHTMLA CH, OEHR.THURXE_CLANGM C, OEHR.THURXE_CHTMLM H WHERE CH.HTML_FL_PTH = H.HTML_FL_PTH AND CH.SRE_VCB_CDVA_ID = C.SRE_VCB_CDVA_ID AND CH.HTML_FL_PTH = #{html}
